00024                         Timer()
00025                         { QueryPerformanceFrequency((LARGE_INTEGER *)&freq); }
00027                         void Start()
00028                         { QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *)&start); }
00030                         double Stop()
00031                         {
00032                                 QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *)&stop);
